plot outline: Sandhya Parulekar also known as Lalbagh Chi Rani suffers from mental illness and is restricted towards school and playing with kids.On her 24th birthday her parents take he rout for treat but Sandhya goes missing.During this phase Sandhya meets various people on streets of Mumbai like an actor Andy and beggar Govinda.Her innocence is such that it can melt a stone hearten.But her parents are more worried about her disappearance.
title: Lalbaugchi Rani
plot: Journey of a 24 year old mentally challenged girl who gets lost in Mumbai. During this unusual adventure, she meets various people from the society and manages to change their lives.

Sandhya Parulekar also known as Lalbagh Chi Rani suffers from mental illness and is restricted towards school and playing with kids.On her 24th birthday her parents take he rout for treat but Sandhya goes missing.During this phase Sandhya meets various people on streets of Mumbai like an actor Andy and beggar Govinda.Her innocence is such that it can melt a stone hearten.But her parents are more worried about her disappearance.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
